message.body: It was great - pretty good house and Dan showed up so I guess it was worth it!
hey girl im lookin at the fringe website now and theres a 2pm show on sat or a 3pm show on sun. i could take sat tickets if those are the ones you have! just email me it and i'll pay ya this weekend.
Ugh I fucked up - got my Saturday and Sunday switched around, turns out I can go! So sorry!
